name: pandowdy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet dish made by cooking fruit, traditionally apples, with a covering made of pieces of pastry or scones (= sweet, roughly shaped bread): Pandowdy is served hot or at room temperature, often with ice cream or cream. I made a pear and raspberrry pandowdy.
More examplesFewer examplesPandowdy is a dessert of sliced apples mixed with cider, brown sugar or molasses, spices, and butter, covered with biscuit dough, and baked.Apple cobbler, apple pandowdy, and apple crisp are all variations of apple pie.
